price: 96. Kurie priskiria Allahui kitą ilah (dievybę), tačiau jie sužinos.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
